text: APN expression and purification . Porcine APN ectodomain ( residues 62 - 963 ) and human APN ecdomain ( residues 66 - 967 ) were expressed and purified as previously described 31 . Briefly , APN ectodomains containing N - terminal honeybee - melittin signal peptide and C - terminal His 6 tag were expressed in insect cells , secreted to cell culture medium , and purified sequentially on Ni - NTA column and gel - filtration column .
